alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 1:32PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Garfield County through 200 PM MDT... At 131 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 13 miles northwest of De Beque, or 31 miles northeast of Grand Junction, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Garfield County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Debeque to Silt Corridor; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
